title: Marine Centre International Launches Customised Yacht Service & Management Packages to Reduce Unnecessary Costs for Boat Owners
text:
Marine Centre International Launches Customised Yacht Service & Management Packages to Reduce Unnecessary Costs for Boat Owners
Marine Centre International has announced the launch of a portfolio of customised yacht service & management packages for boat owners in Egypt.
El Gouna, Egypt, October 23, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Marine Centre International (www.marinecentreint.com), the leading yacht sales & management company for luxury boats in Egypt, including Cranchi, Maiora, Tiara, Capelli and AB Yachts, has announced the launch of a portfolio of customised yacht service & management packages for boat owners in Egypt.
The portfolio includes tailor-made packages that match a boat’s use and specific technical and maintenance needs, allowing boat owners to choose the package that suits them. Essential monthly and annual service and maintenance checks are included in all packages, however each package is designed around different boat specifications, use of boat, personnel needed, etc., to reduce unnecessary expenses and hassle for Marine Centre International clients.
"Boat owners do not want a one fits all fee offered by many yacht service companies, as this often includes redundant costs and is based on an impersonal service with no deep understanding of either the owner’s or the specific boat needs. This is why more and more boat owners switch to our company for the management of their yacht.
"We have always been offering tailored yacht service and management options, all with the same quality level, so we decided to package these options and make them even simpler and more straight forward for boat owners. This, together with the personal relationship we establish with each client and our 24-7 availability, reassures them that they have the most thorough and cost effective service available," says Sandy Koukoura, Communications Director of Marine Centre International.
